<class name="DiscreteFunction" extends="Function" startLine="17">
*
This class represents a function defined from a mapping betweem * two sets (points and values). *
Instance of this class can be used to approximate continuous * functions or to numerically solve differential systems. Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Holds the point-value entries.
<declaration type="SortedMap" name="_pointValues" />
* Holds the variable.
<declaration type="FastList<Variable>" name="_variables" />
* Holds the interpolator.
<declaration type="Interpolator" name="_interpolator" />
* Creates the discrete function for the specified point-value entries. pointValues the point-value entries of this function. interpolator the interpolator. variable this function variable.
* Returns the point-value entries of this discrete function. the point-value mapping.
<method type="SortedMap" name="getPointValues" startLine="63" endLine="65" />
